website_summaries.verdict: If you can't afford a J3, look this way. It may sport a lower-resolution sensor, coarser LCD and plastic body, but the S1 matches its more expensive siblings in many respects. Think with your head rather than your heart and you'll see it's a good deal with much to offer.
cons: Not as appealing as J- and V-series cameras

customer_reviews.title: Great past-gen mirrorless digital camera
customer_reviews.text: Great little mirror-less digital camera. This was delivered on time and in great working condition. Price was very good (at least in my opinion). Not as many bells and whistles as the latest version of this Nikon line of cameras and the user interface isn't the easiest but a great little camera nonetheless and worth the price to me.
customer_reviews.author: JonathanL

customer_reviews.title: An excellent lightweight, easy to carry model
customer_reviews.text: An excellent lightweight, easy to carry model...with Nikon quality producing high quality images...the interchangeable lens capability makes this camera a great value for the shooter who want extra versatility...
customer_reviews.author: R. DEASY

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera
customer_reviews.text: I own two Nikon 1 V1, and I purchase this to supplement them. Already have close to complete set of Nikon 1 lens. The complaint I have is that the body has the kind of slippery finishing as I don't have the habit to install the shoulder strap and I have to shop for the hand or wrist strap.
customer_reviews.author: theothersteve

customer_reviews.title: This pocket camera is awesome to dayly photography and for the price you can't ...
customer_reviews.text: This pocket camera is awesome to dayly photography and for the price you can't go wrong . The raw is nice for people whot want to process their pictures .
customer_reviews.author: yessen bruce

customer_reviews.title: Get camera with tons of features
customer_reviews.text: I own several of Nikon's mid-to-high end DSLR cameras. I wanted something a little more compact that I could carry around to capture everyday candid shots while traveling and something I could use to teach my wife and daughter more about photography. This camera has so many functions it can be hard trying to remember them all. It has most of the features you would find on the upper end DSLRs like shutter and aperture priority, plus a host of many other features. We have not purchased or attempted to swap lenses yet but the collar mechanism seems just a solid as other Nikon builds.
customer_reviews.author: TheChrisDanner

customer_reviews.title: Its a fun, portable and extremely portable camera
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my wife. She is starting to do photography as a hobby and want to step up from a point and shoot. Its a fun, portable and extremely portable camera.
customer_reviews.author: ShepherdJD78

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great buy! It said "used" but I could hardly tell at all. Love all of the accessories. Still need to learn how to use it but that is my own learning curve.
customer_reviews.author: Padderick

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality pictures. The price was excellent. You can easily upgrade the lense. Glad with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ya_Ya

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great, versatile camera. Our only problems have been with the lens opening unexpectedly and battery life.
customer_reviews.author: AK4reviews

customer_reviews.title: Nikon purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my purchase. Price was very good and was delivered as promised.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Krofel

customer_reviews.title: nice camera
customer_reviews.text: it a nice camera but I wanted more of a zoom lens. Delivery was fast Have not yet develop pic yet nice beginner camera if you want more than just a point and shoot
customer_reviews.author: nichole

customer_reviews.title: Kick ass product...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, it exceeded my completly expectations... Once you have the camera, you know that you have a professional camera but easy to use...
customer_reviews.author: Enrique Darinel Gonzalez Campos

customer_reviews.title: Takes awesome pictures!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my gf who wanted to take better pictures but wasn't quite ready for a dslr. This is a great in between with swappable lenses, compact (compared to DSLR) and takes great pictures. Highly recommended for someone not quite professional but want more than a point and shoot.
customer_reviews.author: Jabbajac

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase. Great camera
customer_reviews.text: I was researching small cameras to go on a flight/cruise. Just didn't want the bulk of my larger camera with different zoom lens on a trip with a lot of day trips in European countries. This was perfect ~ not to mention the price was a couple hundred dollars cheaper than the lowest price I could find.
customer_reviews.author: Adele Z

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Something the ladies love. What else do you need to say?
customer_reviews.author: Chih-Chieh Chiang

customer_reviews.title: The BEAST in Pink
customer_reviews.text: This little camera is unbelievably powerful. Bought it for my wife as a point and shoot because she doesnt feel comfortable taking the D7000 everywhere. The photos in "Auto" on this camera are sensational and it is really easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: FloridaFam

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Received what I ordered with no surprises. Everything works! Shipped quickly and kept me updated on status. Very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Robert Ver Duin

customer_reviews.title: Good camera!
customer_reviews.text: Good camera, easy to use. I bought this to use at concerts; which I haven't been to one yet so we'll see in about a week or two if its good for that.
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Incredible
customer_reviews.text: Its really great and a lot of options to explore. But, unfortunatelly when you use the 'auto' the ISO is not the right one. Meaning, even if you use a good resolution, when you take the image on the computer with zoom, all the pixels and 'noises' from ISO are there. But even tho, its amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Viviane Lopes

customer_reviews.title: the product is ok.
customer_reviews.text: the product is ok,but the cover of the lense is so tight that I make great efforts to open it. the shipment and delivery is fast.
customer_reviews.author: Zhigang Du

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This camera is very easy to use, and takes awesome pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Marcela Zozaya

customer_reviews.title: Amazing !!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my sister for X-Mas and she loved it. I used it first for our New Years party and the pictures came out great !! Thinking about buying one for myself !
customer_reviews.author: Josue

customer_reviews.title: So far......
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for over 3 weeks now, SO FAR I LOVE IT, its everything I was expecting, I ordered in a pink color, and it looks really nice and shiny, my friends and family really like it too!!!! I got it from Unique Photo's store and I absolutely love how they do their job, my camerawas here in a week, since it was shipped from New Jersey and I live in Oregon, to me it was fast, there is nothing bad for me to say about the product or the seller besides I really liked everything!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Be careful, that lens is not VR
customer_reviews.text: VR stands for vibration reduction, and that particular lens, 11-27.5mm, does not exist in a VR version, you can check that on Nikon's website. I think it's a mistake amazon has made when naming the product. I had to send it back and get the J3 that comes with a slightly better lens that happens to be VR. Other than that, it is a really good camera but I can't give this review more stars because you cannot sell it with a feature it doesn't have.
customer_reviews.author: Freddy Mac Kee

customer_reviews.title: Great for Travel
customer_reviews.text: This camera and similar models are great for traveling. I like the way the colors come out. It's compact, easy to use, light weight, and has some great lenses. You can get the underwater housing for it and go diving. Everything will fit nicely in your backpack. You can get lights and red filters for color correction in water, but it's not needed in most cases as LightRoom can easily correct the white balance.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Lens broke down 1 year in and they refused to fix it
customer_reviews.text: The lens stopped working after one year of light use. Custom support told me that it's under warranty and asked me to send it in and they'll fix it. Went through the troubles of sending it only to have them send me request to pre-authorize repair costs which are more expensive than just buying the new camera. Contacted support again and they didn't know anything about my previous support requests. Needless to say I'll never own a Nikon camera again.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene

product_meta.title: Nikon 1 S1 10.1 MP HD Digital Camera with 11-27.5mm 1 NIKKOR Lens (White)
product_meta.description:
Color:White| Style:with 11-27.5mm VR 1 NIKKOR LensFROM THE MANUFACTURER



Break free of limitations and capture your world like never before.
Step up to the Nikon 1 system and start capturing all the moments that matter to you, as outstanding photos, HD videos and Motion Snapshots. Streamlined for value, the Nikon 1 S1 balances the exceptional speed and image quality of the Nikon 1 system with innovative new features for catching the best shots and inspiring your creativity. Swap lenses for exciting new views, add creative effects, simultaneously capture video and stills and so much more. Remarkably easy to use and brilliantly designed, the Nikon 1 S1 will have you taking more—and better—photos than ever.








SAY GOODBYE TO BLURRY, OUT-OF-FOCUS IMAGES
SHOOT FASTER THAN EVER FOR CRYSTAL-CLEAR PHOTOS AND FULL HD VIDEOS
The Nikon 1 S1 focuses and shoots faster than any camera you've ever used. While everyone else is framing their first shot, you'll already have captured a dozen great photos. Trying to catch a fast-moving subject? Fire a blazing-fast 15 shots per second and turn an instant of action into an amazing sequence of photos. And don't worry about camera shake—electronic Vibration Reduction keeps your shots steady even when your hands are not.

CATCH THE SHOTS THAT MATTER
SO MANY WAYS TO CAPTURE ONCE-IN-A-LIFETIME MOMENTS
The best moments are made and missed in an instant, so the Nikon 1 S1 gives you every advantage for catching them. Want to capture a baby's smile? Turn on Smart Photo Selector and take your shot. The Nikon 1 S1 will record 20 frames, then pick the best ones. Trying to catch your favorite little leaguer rounding second base? Turn on Slow View and see live action in slow motion, then easily freeze exactly the moment you want to remember. .

GO BEYOND THE STILL PHOTO
SIMULTANEOUSLY RECORD FULL HD 1080P VIDEO AND STILL PHOTOS
Your creativity isn't limited to still photos with Nikon 1 cameras. A single press of a button and you'll be recording dazzling Full HD 1080p video with stereo sound. See something that would make a great still image while you're recording? Simultaneously shoot full-resolution photos without missing a beat. Get the best of both worlds.



SHARE YOUR CREATIONS ANYTIME, ANYWHERE
WIRELESS SHARING TO YOUR SMARTPHONE OR TABLET
With the Nikon 1 S1, you'll never have to wait to share your shots. Add Nikon's WU-1b Wireless Adapter (sold separately), and instantly transfer your photos, videos or Motion Snapshots to your smartphone or tablet. Then share them as usual—by email, text message or by uploading them to your favorite photo-sharing websites. It couldn't be easier!





PREMIUM ACCESSORIES
WU-1b Wireless Mobile Adapter 
Using the WU-1b optional wireless mobile adapter you can now automatically send great images to your smartphone and even use your smartphone to remotely capture images from your Nikon 1 S1. With an easy to use app, now when you can't wait to share that great shot you don't have to. Share it to your smartphone in a instant. EN-EL20 Rechargeable Li-ion Battery
These rechargeable batteries provide extended life and consistent power, even in colder conditions. FT-1 F-Mount Adapter 
Use certain legacy F mount NIKKOR lenses on your Nikon 1 S1 with the FT-1 for added versatility.
feature_bullets: 10.1 MP super high-speed AF CMOS Sensor
Wi-Fi Connectivity with WU-1b adapter (not included)
Best Moment Capture - view live images in slow motion
